p:
The most important and abundant components of the isolated essential oil obtained from R. damascena are reported in Table 1. The results showed that there were 20 different components in the essential oil with a relative composition of 99.72%. Some difference have been detected among the different areas of Iran and in the world as 34 compounds (97%) were found in the specie harvested from the central part of Iran, 17 compounds (97.42%) from that of the northern of Iran, 8 compounds (99.98%) from that of the Southern of Iran, 8 compounds (84.38%) from that of Pakistan, 48 compounds (75.3%) from that of India and 13 compounds (91%) from that of Bulgaria
7, 8, 10, 15â€“ 17 .
